00001 #ifndef AUTOMATION_HPP
00002 #define AUTOMATION_HPP
00003 
00004 #include <vector>
00005 #include <wiselib/ustring/UString.h>
00006 
00007 using namespace std;
00008 using namespace wiselib;
00009 
00014 template<
00015   class STRING_TYPE = string,
00016   typename STRING_TYPE::value_type MULTI_WORDS_WILDCARD = '*',
00017   typename STRING_TYPE::value_type SINGLE_WORD_WILDCARD = '?'
00018   >
00019 class Automation
00020 {
00021   typedef typename STRING_TYPE::value_type charT;
00022   
00023   class _state_ ;
00024   
00025 
00026   class _edge_
00027   {
00028   public:
00029     _edge_(charT c, _state_* p)
00030       :p_(p),ch_(c)
00031     {
00032     }
00033 
00034     _state_* leadTo(charT c)
00035     {
00036       if (c == ch_)
00037         return p_;
00038 
00039       if (ch_ == MULTI_WORDS_WILDCARD)
00040         return p_;
00041 
00042       if (ch_ == SINGLE_WORD_WILDCARD)
00043         return p_;
00044 
00045       return NULL;
00046     }
00047 
00048   friend ostream& operator << ( ostream& os, const _edge_& eg)
00049     {
00050       os<<"<"<<eg.ch_<<">==>"<<eg.p_<<endl;
00051       return os;
00052     }
00053     
00054     
00055   protected:
00056     _state_* p_;
00057     charT ch_;
00058   }
00059     ;
00060 
00061   class _state_
00062   {
00063     vector<_edge_> edges_;
00064 
00065   public:
00066     _state_* nextState(charT ch)
00067     {
00068       for (typename vector<_edge_>::iterator i=edges_.begin(); i!=edges_.end(); i++)
00069       {
00070         _state_* ret = (*i).leadTo(ch);
00071         if (ret != NULL)
00072           return ret;
00073       }
00074 
00075       return NULL;
00076     }
00077 
00078     void insertEdge(charT ch, _state_* p)
00079     {
00080       edges_.push_back(_edge_(ch, p));
00081     }
00082 
00083     void insertEdge(const _edge_& eg)
00084     {
00085       edges_.push_back(eg);
00086     }
00087     
00088 
00089   friend ostream& operator << ( ostream& os, const _state_& st)
00090     {
00091       os<<"state: "<<&st<<endl;
00092       
00093       for (typename vector<_edge_>::const_iterator i=st.edges_.begin(); i!=st.edges_.end(); i++)
00094       {
00095         os<<(*i);
00096       }
00097 
00098       os<<endl;
00099 
00100       return os;
00101     }
00102     
00103   }
00104     ;
00105   
00106   
00107 public:
00111   Automation(const STRING_TYPE& regex)
00112   {
00113     _state_* back = NULL;
00114     _edge_ back_edge(0,0);
00115     _state_* pThisState = new _state_();
00116     pV_.push_back(pThisState);
00117     has_wildcard_ = false;
00118     
00119     pStart_ = pThisState;
00120     pEnd_ = NULL;
00121     
00122     for (size_t i=0; i<regex.length(); i++)
00123     {
00124       _state_* pNextState = new _state_();
00125       pV_.push_back(pNextState);
00126               
00127       if (i == regex.length()-1)
00128         pEnd_ = pNextState;
00129       
00130       if (regex[i]==MULTI_WORDS_WILDCARD)
00131       {
00132         has_wildcard_ = true;
00133         
00134         if (i == regex.length()-1)
00135         {
00136           pThisState->insertEdge(MULTI_WORDS_WILDCARD, pThisState);
00137           pEnd_ = pThisState;
00138           back = pThisState;
00139           break;
00140         }
00141         
00142         pThisState->insertEdge(regex[i+1], pNextState);
00143         back_edge = _edge_(regex[i+1], pNextState);
00144           
00145         pThisState->insertEdge(MULTI_WORDS_WILDCARD, pThisState);
00146         back = pThisState;
00147         pThisState = pNextState;
00148         i++;
00149           
00150         continue;
00151       }
00152 
00153       pThisState->insertEdge(regex[i], pNextState);
00154       if (back != NULL && regex[i]!=SINGLE_WORD_WILDCARD )
00155       {
00156         has_wildcard_ = true;
00157         pThisState->insertEdge(back_edge);
00158         pThisState->insertEdge(MULTI_WORDS_WILDCARD, back);
00159       }
00160       
00161 
00162       pThisState = pNextState;
00163     }
00164 
00165     if (pEnd_ == NULL)
00166       pEnd_ = pThisState;
00167     if (back != NULL)
00168     {
00169       pEnd_->insertEdge(back_edge);
00170       pEnd_->insertEdge(MULTI_WORDS_WILDCARD, back);
00171     }
00172   }
00173 
00174   ~Automation()
00175   {
00176     for (typename vector<_state_*>::iterator i=pV_.begin(); i!=pV_.end(); i++)
00177     {
00178       delete (*i);
00179     }
00180   }
00181 
00182 friend ostream& operator << ( ostream& os, const Automation<STRING_TYPE, MULTI_WORDS_WILDCARD, SINGLE_WORD_WILDCARD>& aut)
00183   {
00184     for (typename vector<_state_*>::const_iterator i=aut.pV_.begin(); i!=aut.pV_.end(); i++)
00185       os<< *(*i);
00186     
00187     return os;
00188   }
00189   
00193   bool match(const STRING_TYPE& str)
00194   {
00195     _state_* next = pStart_;
00196     
00197     for (size_t i=0; i<str.length(); i++)
00198     {
00199       //cout<<endl<<str[i]<<endl;
00200       next = next->nextState(str[i]);
00201       
00202       if (next == NULL)
00203         return false;
00204       
00205       //cout<<next;
00206     }
00207 
00208     if (next == pEnd_)
00209       return true;
00210 
00211     return false;
00212   }
00213   
00217   bool hasWildcard()const
00218   {
00219     return has_wildcard_;
00220   }
00221   
00222 
00223 protected:
00224   _state_* pStart_;
00225   _state_* pEnd_;
00226   vector<_state_*> pV_;
00227   bool has_wildcard_;
00228   
00229 }
00230   ;
